Safety for both drivers and riders.

settings.title: How safety is ensured?
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit integer.
Trained Support Team
An exclusively trained team is available 24/7. You can reach them via our app anytime for safety concern.
Community & Unions
All the riders and drivers share a set of Community Guidelines; making them more responsible and accountable.
Safety through App
Your trip details can be tracked and monitored live by your loved ones. One tap can save you in case of emergency.
